works.description:
My name is Robert L Fuller and I've just 

became aware there are pictures of me, that I did not authorize to be used
 
on one of your blogspot users site. There are also copies of my police  
record from 1970 being published and slandering my name. I am requesting  
this page remove from the blogspot account. I have filed a local police  
report with my local police station as this is a crime for someone to  
slander another.

You could call and verify my details and I could send copies of my  
Identification to verify my identity if need.

Robert Fuller
310-329-7470
